name: Item Sweep (AGBIC Edition)
description:
I introduce Item Sweep! This is my game for the "A Game by it's Cover" game jam and is my 10th game jam that I have successfully accomplished. While I intend to expand upon this game and give it a full release, I would like to celebrate this accomplishment with you by forever sharing the AGBIC Edition of Item Sweep!

Inspired by Namada's ITEM CONNECT case

Sweep through the board and uncover all the chest.

Open as many chest as you can to collect as many items as you can.

Simple as that and don't worry we "save" your items so you can take a break here and there.

Over 30 items to collect!

Also avaible on the Play Store for Android

--------CREDITS--------

Development by Asix Jin (@AsixJin on Twitter)

Music - Ice Flow Kevin MacLeod - www.incompetech.com

Graphics from http://textcraft.net/ & http://oryxdesignlab.com/product-sprites/
